mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS (rno, prog_num, reply, user_id, rating) VALUES (seq_comment_num.nextval, #{prog_num}, #{reply}, #{user_id}, #{rating})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET reply = #{reply}, rating = #{rating}, updatedate = sysdate WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT rno, user_id, prog_num, replydate, reply, rating, updatedate FROM COMMENTS WHERE prog_num = #{prog_num} ORDER BY rno DESC
